about: I specialize in backend development and building scalable, high-performance systems. I have extensive experience with modern frameworks like Django and Next.js, cloud infrastructure on AWS, and a strong commitment to the open-source community. My goal is to create impactful, future-ready products that solve real problems and drive value at scale.

workExperience.company: BCloudOne Jewellery and VStyle Private Limited
description: Led backend development for a multifaceted Jewellery e-commerce platform.
Designed and integrated a monthly installment system and major payment gateways to enhance user experience.
Improved API response times by optimizing complex PostgreSQL queries and implementing strategic indexing.
Engineered and deployed a scalable infrastructure on AWS, ensuring high operational uptime.
Eliminated data polling delays by implementing real-time GraphQL subscriptions over WebSockets.
Delivered a proof-of-concept that boosted performance in data-intensive tasks by integrating WebAssembly (Wasm).

achievements.name: Google Summer of Code - OpenWISP
achievements.description: Selected for GSoC to overhaul the OpenWISP Notifications Module. Designed and built a new REST API and UI to centralize notification management for thousands of users.

achievements.name: Google Code-In Runner Up - OSGeo
achievements.description: Recognized as a top performer for completing over 60+ technical and documentation tasks for the OSGeo open-source community.

projects.name: Amul Protein Stock Update Bot
projects.description: A bot that tracks all Amul e-stores across India, sending real-time notifications about stock updates for protein products. It runs every minute to ensure timely alerts.

projects.name: QPGen
projects.description: Built a platform to fully automate the exam paper creation process for over 200 faculty and 5,000+ students, leveraging Cloudflare Workers AI to generate and rephrase questions.

projects.name: LeetBuddy.nvim (Open Source)
projects.description: Authored a Neovim plugin in Lua to solve and submit LeetCode problems from the editor. Downloaded by over 1,000 users and garnered 130+ GitHub stars.
